title: Peer-to-peer for shell scripts
author: chr15m
content: readme.md peer--peer networking shell scripts & os pipes.npm install chr15m/dreamtimerun./node_modules/.bin/dreamtime unique-room-identifierexample: aggregate output ping different servers:ping -n wikipedia.org | stdbuf -ol cut -b15- | dreamtime ping-partyimplementationdreamtime is built top webtorrent uses bittorrent extension protocol messaging.security notechannels are completely public. anybody join eavesdrop. don't share secrets them.
